summary: Project involves a team/host details page with glassmorphic design, displaying enhanced photos for team members. Currently adding and enhancing a photo for team member Saarumathi.A.
architectural_notes: Team/host details page uses glassmorphic design for displaying member photos
imageRequirements:
## Edit Images
- Enhance the portrait photo with improved brightness, contrast, sharpness, and skin tone clarity; crop to focus on face and upper body with a clean, professional look (IMG_20260226_111401.jpg > saarumathi-profile-enhanced.dim_400x500.jpg)

existing_features.title: Use the uploaded photo of Saarumathi.A (IMG_20260226_111401.jpg) as the enhanced profile image static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/saarumathi-profile-enhanced.jpg, consistent with how Naveen.V's enhanced photo was integrated.

Display Saarumathi.A's enhanced profile photo in the TeamMembersPage carousel slide for her profile, replacing the fallback initials avatar. The photo should render inside a glassmorphic card matching the existing styling used for Naveen.V's profile slide.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add and enhance photo for team member Saarumathi.A on the team details page
